name: MaryHadaLittleNoun
0: ”Alexa, open Mary had a little noun”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mary had a little noun
des:
From the team that helped a three year old go from phonics to reading at a second grade level comes "Mary Had A Little Noun." 

Mary Had a Little Noun uses a classic nursery rhyme, a framework almost every child is familiar with, as a way to re-introduce and practice identifying nouns within phrases and sentences.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
